panels.description: The panel displays a latency heatmap of requests, utilizing Prometheus data to visualize the sum increase in request duration per selected service. The heatmap format provides a distinct view of latency patterns over time.
panels.title: Request Latency Heatmap
Time Series - Bars with hue gradient
Table - Color backgrounds or value using thresholds or value mappings
Pie Chart - GDP per Capita, GDP > $50k
